mapper.insert: insert into tbl_archive (title, member_id, create_time, description, keywords, view_rank, view_count, writer, source, pub_time, thumbnail, content) values (#{title}, #{memberId}, now(), #{description}, #{keywords}, #{viewRank}, #{viewCount}, #{writer}, #{source}, now(), #{thumbnail}, #{content})
mapper.update: update tbl_archive set view_count=view_count+1 where archive_id=${archiveId}
update tbl_archive set favor = favor + #{num} where archive_id = #{archiveId}
